Sinopse: Two desperate dads compete in a no-holds-barred battle to be the best father and make this the best Christmas ever. Fun-loving, laid-back dad Larry is having a bear of a time finding the perfect Christmas gift for his 8-year-old daughter Noel. The season's hottest toy, Harrison the Talking Bear, is all sold out, and Noel's new stepfather Victor wants to keep it that way so he can be the one to make her holiday wish come true. When Larry learns that all that she wants for Christmas is Harrison, he'll stop at nothing to get her the toy of her dreams and make her happy.—Twentieth Century Fox Home Entertainment
